publicationStmt.publisher: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

addrLine.ref: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

availability.p: Copyright Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

msIdentifier.institution: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland
msIdentifier.idno: CODRINGTON/READE NO 37. KEPT SEPARATELY IN UN-NUMBERED CASE.

author.persName: Mir Khwand (Muhammad b. Khawand Shah b. Mahmud).

msItem.title: Raudat al-Safa. Vols. I, II, III.
msItem.note: Part of the same work as Codrington/Reade No 29. Ruled margins. Headings and punctuation in red.

listBibl.bibl: General Gordon's bequest is mentioned, without details in the donations register under November 6 1841. The bequest is mentioned in J.R.A.S., vii, 1843, Annual Report, p. x, and the manuscripts are briefly listed in the Proceedings, pp. xxx-xxxi.

bindingDesc.p: Oriental red leather binding with stamped cartouches.

origin.p: Book I, 6 Dhu 'l-Qa'da 1022. Book II, `6 Jumada II 1023. Book III, 6 third month 1024.

acquisition.p: Bequest of General Thomas Gordon (of Buthlaw).

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
